TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Help extends System.Object

summary.span: 封裝 HTML Help 1.0 引擎。

span.span: Encapsulates the HTML Help 1.0 engine.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您無法建立的新執行個體類別。You cannot create a new instance of the class. 若要提供應用程式的說明，可以呼叫靜態和方法。To provide Help for an application, call the static and methods. 您可以使用顯示編譯的說明檔案 (.chm) 或 HTML 說明格式的 HTML 檔案。You can use to show compiled Help files (.chm) or HTML files in the HTML Help format. 編譯的說明檔提供的內容、 索引、 搜尋功能和關鍵字網頁中的連結資料表。Compiled Help files provide a table of contents, an index, search capability, and keyword links in pages. 快速鍵可以使用只在已編譯的說明檔案。Shortcuts work only in compiled Help files. 您可以使用 HTML Help Workshop 產生的 HTML 說明 1.x 檔。You can generate HTML Help 1.x files by using HTML Help Workshop. 如需有關 HTML 說明的詳細資訊，請參閱 「 HTML Help Workshop 」 以及其他 HTML 說明主題在[Microsoft HTML 說明](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178661)。For more information about HTML Help, see "HTML Help Workshop" and other HTML Help topics at [Microsoft HTML Help](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178661). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示一個表單，包含可用於互動 Mspaint.chm 說明檔的三個按鈕。The following code example displays a form that contains three buttons that can be used to interact with the Mspaint.chm Help file. **顯示說明索引**按鈕可顯示**索引** 索引標籤的說明檔。The **Show Help Index** button displays the **Index** tab for the Help file. **顯示說明**按鈕會顯示說明檔中的值中所選取的內容**說明導覽**清單。The **Show Help** button displays content in the Help file based on the value that is selected in the **Help Navigator** list. **顯示關鍵字**按鈕會顯示說明檔中根據關鍵字中指定的內容**關鍵字**文字方塊。The **Show Keyword** button displays content in the Help file based on the keyword that is specified in the **Keyword** text box. 例如，顯示 [橢圓形說明畫面索引值，請選取值**說明導覽**下拉式清單中，輸入**橢圓形**中**參數**文字方塊，然後再按一下**顯示說明**] 按鈕。For example, to show the Ovals Help page by the index value, select the value in the **Help Navigator** drop-down list, type **ovals** in the **Parameter** text box, and then click the **Show Help** button. 若要顯示關鍵字的 < 若要繪製的筆刷 」 說明主題，請輸入**mspaint.chm::/paint_brush.htm**中**關鍵字**文字方塊，然後再按一下**顯示關鍵字** 按鈕。To show the "To paint with a brush" Help topic by the keyword, type **mspaint.chm::/paint_brush.htm** in the **Keyword** text box, and then click the **Show Keyword** button. 此範例會使用方法，以顯示不同的說明索引標籤和說明主題和方法，以顯示 [說明] 索引。The example uses the method to display the different Help tabs and Help topics, and the method to display the Help index. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Help#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Help/CPP/helpsnippet.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Help#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Help/CS/helpsnippet.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Help#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Help/VB/helpsnippet.vb#1)]

span.span: Displays the contents of a Help file.

.method public static hidebysig void ShowHelp(class System.Windows.Forms.Control parent, string url) cil managed

public: static void ShowHelp(System::Windows::Forms::Control ^ parent, System::String ^ url);
static member ShowHelp : System.Windows.Forms.Control * string -> unit

param.name: parent
param.span: 識別 [說明] 對話方塊父代的 。

span.span: A that identifies the parent of the Help dialog box.
The path and name of the Help file.

summary.span: 在指定的 URL 顯示說明檔的內容。

span.span: Displays the contents of the Help file at the specified URL.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `url`參數可以是表單 C:\path\sample.chm 或 /folder/file.htm。The `url` parameter can be of the form C:\path\sample.chm or /folder/file.htm. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範方法。The following code example demonstrates the method. 若要執行此範例中，貼上下列程式碼包含名為按鈕的表單`Button1`。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a button named `Button1`. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HelpExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

span.span: Displays the contents of the Help file found at the specified URL for a specific keyword.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `url`參數可以是表單 C:\path\sample.chm 或 /folder/file.htm。The `url` parameter can be of the form C:\path\sample.chm or /folder/file.htm. 如果您提供關鍵字`null`，將會顯示說明檔的目錄。If you provide the keyword `null`, the table of contents for the Help file will be displayed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示具有可用互動 mspaint.chm 說明檔的三個按鈕的表單。The following code example displays a form with three buttons that can be used to interact with the mspaint.chm Help file. **顯示說明索引**按鈕可顯示**索引** 索引標籤的說明檔。The **Show Help Index** button displays the **Index** tab for the Help file. **顯示說明**按鈕會顯示說明檔中的值中所選取的內容**說明導覽**清單。The **Show Help** button displays content in the Help file based on the value that is selected in the **Help Navigator** list. **顯示關鍵字**按鈕會顯示說明檔中根據關鍵字中指定的內容**關鍵字**文字方塊。The **Show Keyword** button displays content in the Help file based on the keyword that is specified in the **Keyword** text box. 例如，顯示 [橢圓形說明畫面索引值，請選取值**說明導覽**下拉式清單中，輸入**橢圓形**中**參數**文字方塊，然後再按一下**顯示說明**] 按鈕。For example, to show the Ovals Help page by the index value, select the value in the **Help Navigator** drop-down list, type **ovals** in the **Parameter** text box, and then click the **Show Help** button. 若要顯示關鍵字的 < 若要繪製的筆刷 」 說明主題，請輸入**mspaint.chm::/paint_brush.htm**中**關鍵字**文字方塊，然後再按一下**顯示關鍵字** 按鈕。To show the "To paint with a brush" Help topic by the keyword, type **mspaint.chm::/paint_brush.htm** in the **Keyword** text box, and then click the **Show Keyword** button. 此範例示範只呼叫方法。This example shows only the call to the method. 請參閱類別概觀的完整程式碼範例。See the class overview for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Help#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Help/CPP/helpsnippet.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Help#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Help/CS/helpsnippet.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Help#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Help/VB/helpsnippet.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `url`參數可以是表單 C:\path\sample.chm 或 /folder/file.htm。The `url` parameter can be of the form C:\path\sample.chm or /folder/file.htm. 編譯的說明檔提供的內容、 索引、 搜尋和網頁中的關鍵字連結的資料表。Compiled Help files provide table of contents, index, search, and keyword links in pages. 您可以使用下列值`navigator`參數： ， ， ，或。You can use the following values for the `navigator` parameter: , , , or . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法來開啟它的索引頁的說明檔。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to open a Help file to its index page. 若要執行此範例中，貼上下列程式碼包含名為按鈕的表單`Button2`。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a button named `Button2`. param.name: parameter
param.span: 包含主題識別項的字串。

span.span: A string that contains the topic identifier.

summary.span: 顯示 URL 中使用者提供的說明檔內容。

span.span: Displays the contents of the Help file located at the URL supplied by the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 編譯的說明檔提供的目錄、 索引、 搜尋和關鍵字網頁中的連結。Compiled Help files provide table-of-contents, index, search, and keyword links in pages. 您可以使用`param`參數，以提供的其他改良， ， ，或命令。You can use the `param` parameter to provide additional refinement of the , , , or command. 如果在指定的值`command`參數是， ，或，這個值應該是`empty string`。If the value specified in the `command` parameter is , , or , this value should be an `empty string`. 如果`command`參數參考， ， ，或，這個值應該是字串，包含主題名稱或要顯示之主題的關鍵字或數值識別碼。If the `command` parameter references , , , or , this value should be a string that contains the topic name, or the keyword or numeric identifier of the topic to display. `url`參數可以是表單 C:\path\sample.chm 或 /folder/file.htm。The `url` parameter can be of the form C:\path\sample.chm or /folder/file.htm. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示具有可用互動 mspaint.chm 說明檔的三個按鈕的表單。The following code example displays a form with three buttons that can be used to interact with the mspaint.chm Help file. **顯示說明索引**按鈕可顯示**索引** 索引標籤的說明檔。The **Show Help Index** button displays the **Index** tab for the Help file. **顯示說明**按鈕會顯示說明檔中的值中所選取的內容**說明導覽**清單。The **Show Help** button displays content in the Help file based on the value that is selected in the **Help Navigator** list. **顯示關鍵字**按鈕會顯示說明檔中根據關鍵字中指定的內容**關鍵字**文字方塊。The **Show Keyword** button displays content in the Help file based on the keyword that is specified in the **Keyword** text box. 例如，顯示 [橢圓形說明畫面索引值，請選取值**說明導覽**下拉式清單中，輸入**橢圓形**中**參數**文字方塊，然後再按一下**顯示說明**] 按鈕。For example, to show the Ovals Help page by the index value, select the value in the **Help Navigator** drop-down list, type **ovals** in the **Parameter** text box, and then click the **Show Help** button. 若要顯示關鍵字的 < 若要繪製的筆刷 」 說明主題，請輸入**mspaint.chm::/paint_brush.htm**中**關鍵字**文字方塊，然後再按一下**顯示關鍵字** 按鈕。To show the "To paint with a brush" Help topic by the keyword, type **mspaint.chm::/paint_brush.htm** in the **Keyword** text box, and then click the **Show Keyword** button. 此範例示範只呼叫方法。This example shows only the call to the method. 請參閱類別概觀的完整程式碼範例。See the class overview for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Help#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Help/CPP/helpsnippet.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Help#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Help/CS/helpsnippet.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Help#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Help/VB/helpsnippet.vb#3)]

summary.span: 顯示 [說明] 快顯視窗 (Pop-Up Window)。

span.span: Displays a Help pop-up window.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用事件類別，以顯示快顯樣式協助使用者。The following code example uses the event with the class to display pop-up style help to the user. [!code-cpp[Control.KeyUp#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyUp/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control.KeyUp#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyUp/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control.KeyUp#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyUp/VB/form1.vb#1)]
